functions.label: ContentListProvider
description:
Main provider component for content list functionality, including data fetching
(via React Query), sorting, and search.

Props like `dataSource` and `features` should be stable references to avoid
unnecessary re-renders. Configuration from `features.sorting` and `features.search`
is read once at mount; use a `key` prop to remount if you need to change initial
state dynamically.
signature: ({ children, dataSource, labels, item, isReadOnly, id, queryKeyScope: queryKeyScopeProp, features, }:

children.label:
{
  children,
  dataSource,
  labels,
  item,
  isReadOnly,
  id,
  queryKeyScope: queryKeyScopeProp,
  features = {},
}

functions.label: DeleteConfirmationComponent
description:
Presentational confirmation modal for delete operations.

Stateless â€” all data and callbacks are provided via props.
Use {@link DeleteConfirmationModal} for the connected version that
reads from content list context.
signature: ({ items, entityName, entityNamePlural, isDeleting, error, onCancel, onConfirm, }:

children.label:
{
  items,
  entityName,
  entityNamePlural,
  isDeleting,
  error,
  onCancel,
  onConfirm,
}

functions.label: DeleteConfirmationModal
description:
Connected confirmation modal for delete operations.

Reads `item.onDelete` and entity labels from the provider config, calls
`refetch` on success, and manages `isDeleting`/`error` locally.
Delegates rendering to {@link DeleteConfirmationComponent}.

functions.label: useContentListConfig
description:
Hook to access the content list configuration context.

This is a low-level hook that provides access to configuration and support flags.
For most use cases, prefer the feature-specific hooks like `useContentListItems`,
`useContentListSort`, etc.
returnComment: The content list context including configuration and support flags.

functions.label: useContentListItems
description: Hook to access the current list of items and loading state.
signature: <Record<string, unknown>>[]; totalItems: number; isLoading: boolean; isFetching: boolean; error: Error | undefined; refetch: () => void; }
returnComment: Object containing items, totalItems, isLoading, isFetching, error, and refetch.

functions.label: useContentListPagination
description:
Hook to access and control pagination functionality.

Use this hook when you need to read or update the current page.
When pagination is disabled via `features.pagination: false`, `setPageIndex`
and `setPageSize` become no-ops and `isSupported` returns `false`.
returnComment: Object containing pagination state and control functions.

functions.label: useContentListSearch
description:
Hook to access and control the search query text.

Returns the raw `EuiSearchBar` query text (`search.queryText`) and a setter
that atomically updates both the displayed query text and the parsed filters
used for data fetching. When search is disabled via `features.search: false`,
`setSearch` becomes a no-op and `isSupported` returns `false`.
returnComment: Object containing `search` text, `setSearch` function, and `isSupported` flag.

functions.label: useContentListSelection
description:
Hook to access and control item selection.

Provides the current selection state and functions to modify it.
When selection is disabled (via `features.selection: false` or `isReadOnly`),
`setSelection` and `clearSelection` become no-ops and `isSupported` returns `false`.
returnComment: Object containing selection state, mutation functions, and support flag.

functions.label: useContentListSort
description:
Hook to access and control sorting functionality.

Use this hook when you need to read or update the sort configuration.
When sorting is disabled via `features.sorting: false`, `setSort` becomes a no-op
and `isSupported` returns `false`.
returnComment: Object containing field, direction, setSort function, and isSupported flag.

functions.label: useContentListState
description:
Hook to access the content list state and dispatch function.

This is a low-level hook. For most use cases, prefer the feature-specific hooks
like `useContentListSort`, `useContentListItems`, etc.
returnComment: The state context value including state, dispatch, and refetch.

functions.label: useDeleteConfirmation
description:
Encapsulates the open/close state for a {@link DeleteConfirmationModal}.

Consumers call `requestDelete(items)` to open the modal and render
`deleteModal` in their JSX. The modal handles confirmation, deletion
(via the provider's `onDelete`), loading, and error display internally.

interfaces.label: ActiveFilters
description: Active filters applied to the content list.

children.label: search
description: Search text extracted from the search bar, without filter syntax.

interfaces.label: ContentListFeatures
description: Feature configuration for enabling/customizing content list capabilities.

children.label: sorting
description: Sorting configuration.

children.label: pagination
description: Pagination configuration. Set to `false` to disable pagination entirely.

children.label: search
description: Search configuration.

children.label: selection
description:
Selection configuration.
When `true` (default), row selection checkboxes are shown and bulk
actions are enabled. Set to `false` to disable selection entirely.
Selection is automatically disabled when `isReadOnly` is `true`.

interfaces.label: ContentListItemConfig
description: Per-item configuration for link behavior and actions.

children.label: getHref
description:
Function to generate the href for an item link.
When provided, item titles become clickable links.

children.label: getEditUrl
description:
Function to generate the edit URL for an item.
When provided, the edit action renders as an `<a>` link with this `href`,
preserving native link behavior (right-click, middle-click, screen reader
announcement).

Composable with `onEdit`: when both are provided, the action renders as a
link (`href`) and also calls `onEdit` on click (e.g., for analytics tracking).

children.label: onEdit
description:
Callback invoked when the edit action is clicked.
Use this for side effects such as opening a flyout, tracking analytics,
or programmatic navigation.

When provided alone, the action renders as a button with an `onClick` handler.
When provided alongside `getEditUrl`, both are applied: the action renders
as a link and the callback fires on click.

children.label: onDelete
description:
Callback invoked to delete one or more items.
When provided, enables the delete action on rows and the bulk-delete flow.
The callback should handle the actual deletion and return a resolved promise on success.

interfaces.label: ContentListLabels
description:
User-facing labels for the content type.

These should be i18n-translated strings for display in the UI.

children.label: entity
description: Singular form of the entity name (e.g., "dashboard"). Should be i18n-translated.

children.label: entityPlural
description: Plural form of the entity name (e.g., "dashboards"). Should be i18n-translated.

children.label: searchPlaceholder
description: Placeholder text for the search input. Should be i18n-translated.

interfaces.label: ContentListQueryData
description:
Query data returned from React Query.

This is read-only state derived from the data fetching layer.

children.label: items
description: Currently loaded items (transformed for rendering).

children.label: totalItems
description: Total number of items matching the current query (for pagination).

children.label: isLoading
description:
Whether the initial data load is in progress (no data available yet).

This is `true` only on the first fetch before any data has been received.
Use this for hard loading states (e.g., skeletons, spinners) when there is
nothing to show. Once data has been loaded, subsequent fetches triggered by
filter or search changes keep `isLoading` as `false` while the previous
data remains visible.

children.label: isFetching
description:
Whether a fetch is currently in progress (including background refetches).

Unlike `isLoading`, this is `true` during any fetch, including background
refetches triggered by search, sort, or filter changes. Use this for subtle
loading indicators (e.g., progress bar, reduced opacity) that should not
hide existing content.

children.label: error
description: Error from the most recent fetch attempt.

interfaces.label: ContentListSupports
description:
Resolved feature support flags.

These flags represent the **effective** availability of features after evaluating:
- Explicit configuration (e.g., `features.sorting: true` or `features.sorting: { ... }`)
- Implicit enablement (e.g., providing required services enabling a feature)
- Explicit disablement (e.g., `features.sorting: false` overrides defaults)
- Implicit disablement (e.g., missing services)

Use these flags to conditionally render UI elements or enable functionality based on
what's actually available, rather than checking raw configuration values.

children.label: sorting
description: Whether sorting is supported.

children.label: pagination
description: Whether pagination is supported.

children.label: search
description: Whether search is supported.

children.label: selection
description: Whether item selection and bulk actions are supported.

interfaces.label: DataSourceConfig
description: Data source configuration properties.

children.label: findItems
description: Fetches items from the data source.

children.label: onFetchSuccess
description: Called after successful fetch.

interfaces.label: DeleteConfirmationComponentProps
description: Props for the presentational {@link DeleteConfirmationComponent}.

children.label: items
description: Items being deleted.

children.label: entityName
description: Singular entity name (e.g., "dashboard").

children.label: entityNamePlural
description: Plural entity name (e.g., "dashboards").

children.label: isDeleting
description: Whether a delete operation is currently executing.

children.label: error
description: Error message from the last failed attempt, displayed inline.

children.label: onCancel
description: Called when the user cancels.

children.label: onConfirm
description: Called when the user confirms.

interfaces.label: DeleteConfirmationModalProps
description: Props for the connected {@link DeleteConfirmationModal}.

children.label: items
description: Items to delete.

children.label: onClose
description: Called when the modal should close (cancel or successful delete).

interfaces.label: FindItemsParams
description: Parameters for the `findItems` function.

children.label: searchQuery
description:
Search query text with filter syntax already extracted.

This is a convenience alias for `filters.search ?? ''`. When building
queries, prefer this over accessing `filters.search` directly.

children.label: filters
description: Active filters (includes the raw `search` text and any structured filters).

children.label: sort
description:
Sort configuration.

When sorting is disabled via `features.sorting: false`, this will be `undefined`.
Implementations should return items in their natural order (e.g., server default).

children.label: page
description: Pagination configuration.

children.label: signal
description: AbortSignal for request cancellation.

interfaces.label: FindItemsResult
description: Result from the `findItems` function.

children.label: items
description: Items for the current page.

children.label: total
description: Total matching items for pagination.

interfaces.label: PaginationConfig
description: Pagination configuration.

children.label: initialPageSize
description: Initial number of items per page. Defaults to {@link DEFAULT_PAGE_SIZE}.

children.label: pageSizeOptions
description: Available page size options. Defaults to {@link DEFAULT_PAGE_SIZE_OPTIONS}.

interfaces.label: SearchConfig
description:
Search configuration.

Controls the search input behavior in the toolbar.

children.label: initialSearch
description: Initial search text to populate on mount.

interfaces.label: SortField
description:
Simplified sort field definition.

The Sort component auto-generates asc/desc options from this definition.

children.label: field
description: Field to sort by (must match data field name).

children.label: name
description: Display name for the field (used to generate default labels).

children.label: ascLabel
description: Custom label for ascending sort (overrides auto-generated label).

children.label: descLabel
description: Custom label for descending sort (overrides auto-generated label).

interfaces.label: SortingConfig
description:
Sorting configuration.

Use `fields` for the simpler API where asc/desc options are auto-generated.
Use `options` for full control over each dropdown option.

children.label: fields
description: Simplified sortable fields - auto-generates asc/desc options for each field.

children.label: options
description:
Explicit sort options with full control over labels.
Ignored if `fields` is provided.

children.label: initialSort
description: Initial sort state.

interfaces.label: SortOption
description: Sort option definition with explicit label, field, and direction.

children.label: label
description: Display label for the sort option.

children.label: field
description: Field to sort by.

children.label: direction
description: Sort direction.

interfaces.label: UseContentListPaginationReturn
description: Return type for the {@link useContentListPagination} hook.

children.label: isSupported
description: Whether pagination is supported (enabled via features).

children.label: pageIndex
description: Current page index (0-based).

children.label: pageSize
description: Current number of items per page.

children.label: totalItems
description: Total number of items matching the current query.

children.label: pageCount
description: Total number of pages.

children.label: pageSizeOptions
description: Available page size options for the dropdown.

children.label: setPageIndex
description: Navigate to a specific page index. No-op if pagination is disabled.

children.label: setPageSize
description: Change the page size (resets to page 0). No-op if pagination is disabled. Persists to `localStorage`.

interfaces.label: UseContentListSearchReturn
description: Return type for the {@link useContentListSearch} hook.

children.label: search
description: Current search text (empty string when no search is active).

children.label: setSearch
description:
Atomically updates the query text and parsed filters in a single dispatch.
No-op if search is disabled.

children.label: queryText
description: - The raw `EuiSearchBar` query text (may include filter syntax).

children.label: filters
description: - The parsed {@link ActiveFilters} derived from `queryText`.

children.label: isSupported
description: Whether search is supported (enabled via features).

interfaces.label: UseContentListSelectionReturn
description: Return type for the {@link useContentListSelection} hook.

children.label: selectedIds
description: IDs of currently selected items.

children.label: selectedItems
description: Currently selected items resolved from the loaded items list.

children.label: selectedCount
description: Number of currently selected items.

children.label: isSelected
description: Whether a specific item is selected.

children.label: setSelection
description:
Replace the selection with the given items.
Typically called by `EuiBasicTable`'s `onSelectionChange` callback.

children.label: clearSelection
description: Clear all selected items.

children.label: isSupported
description: Whether selection is supported (enabled via features, not read-only).

interfaces.label: UseContentListSortReturn
description: Return type for the `useContentListSort` hook.

children.label: field
description: Current sort field name.

children.label: direction
description: Current sort direction.

children.label: setSort
description: Updates the sort configuration. No-op if sorting is disabled.

children.label: isSupported
description: Whether sorting is supported (enabled via features).

interfaces.label: UseDeleteConfirmationOptions
description: Options for {@link useDeleteConfirmation}.

children.label: onClose
description:
Called after the modal closes (cancel or successful delete).
Use for side effects like clearing selection state.

interfaces.label: UseDeleteConfirmationReturn
description: Return value of {@link useDeleteConfirmation}.

children.label: requestDelete
description: Trigger the delete confirmation modal for the given items.

children.label: deleteModal
description: The modal element to render, or `null` when inactive.

misc.label: ContentListConfig
description: Complete configuration for a content list.

misc.label: ContentListCoreConfig
description: Core configuration - entity metadata and base settings.

misc.label: ContentListIdentity
description:
Identity configuration for content lists.

At least one of `id` or `queryKeyScope` must be provided:

- **`id` only**: `queryKeyScope` is derived as `${id}-listing`. Use when you want a simple
  identifier that also serves as the cache key base.

- **`queryKeyScope` only**: Use when you only need cache isolation without a semantic identifier.

- **Both**: `queryKeyScope` is used for caching/persistence, `id` is available for other
  purposes (e.g., `data-test-subj`, analytics).
signature: { id: string; queryKeyScope?: string | undefined; } | { id?: string | undefined; queryKeyScope: string; }

misc.label: ContentListItem
description:
Standardized item structure for rendering components (tables, grids, etc.).

This is the common interface that all rendering components work with,
regardless of the underlying datasource type. The `findItems` function
in `DataSourceConfig` must return items in this format.
signature: T & { id: string; title: string; description?: string | undefined; type?: string | undefined; updatedAt?: Date | undefined; }

misc.label: ContentListProviderProps
description: Props for the `ContentListProvider` component.

misc.label: FindItemsFn
description: Function signature for fetching items from a data source.

objects.label: CONTENT_LIST_ACTIONS
description: Action type constants for state reducer.
signature: { readonly SET_SEARCH: "SET_SEARCH"; readonly CLEAR_FILTERS: "CLEAR_FILTERS"; readonly SET_SORT: "SET_SORT"; readonly SET_PAGE_INDEX: "SET_PAGE_INDEX"; readonly SET_PAGE_SIZE: "SET_PAGE_SIZE"; readonly SET_SELECTION: "SET_SELECTION"; readonly CLEAR_SELECTION: "CLEAR_SELECTION"; }

objects.label: contentListKeys
description:
Query keys for content list items.

Uses `queryKeyScope` (a stable identifier) to prevent cache collisions.
Intentionally does not use user-facing labels (which may be i18n-translated)
to ensure cache stability across locales.

children.label: all
description:
/**
   * Base query key for all content list queries.
   *
   * @param queryKeyScope - Stable scope identifier for cache isolation.
   */

children.label: items
description:
/**
   * Query key for items queries with specific parameters.
   *
   * @param queryKeyScope - Stable scope identifier for cache isolation.
   * @param params - Query parameters (search, filters, sort, page).
   */

objects.label: DEFAULT_FILTERS
description: Default filter state.
